title: Remove video background & compose on custom video background with Google Drive
description:
## How it works

â€¢ Upload foreground video (AI actors, product demos, webcam footage)
â€¢ Provide custom background video URL
â€¢ API removes video background with videobgremover.com
â€¢ Composites foreground onto background
â€¢ Downloads and uploads to Google Drive
â€¢ Returns shareable link

## Set up steps

â€¢ Get API key at https://videobgremover.com/n8n (2 min)
â€¢ Import workflow (1 min)
â€¢ Add API key to n8n variables as VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY (1 min)
â€¢ Connect Google Drive (2 min)
â€¢ Test with manual trigger (1 min)
â€¢ Total: 7 minutes

## What you'll need

â€¢ VideoBGRemover API key ($0.50-$2.00 per minute)
â€¢ Google Drive account
â€¢ Publicly accessible video URLs
â€¢ n8n instance

## Perfect for

â€¢ AI UGC ad creators using HeyGen, Synthesia, Arcads
â€¢ Marketing agencies creating ad variations
â€¢ E-commerce product demos on custom backgrounds
â€¢ Social media content with branded scenes
â€¢ Video editors removing backgrounds at scale

## Key features

â€¢ Video composition with custom templates
â€¢ Audio mixing with adjustable volumes
â€¢ 20-second polling for status
â€¢ Google Drive integration
â€¢ Webhook automation support
â€¢ 3-5 minute processing time per minutes of input video
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
